Question: Shenzhen Chinsources Electronics Technology Co.Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Chinsources Electronics Technology Co., Ltd

Endoscope and New Energy Products

- National high-tech enterprise established in 2009
- Specializes in industrial inspection cameras, otoscope, laryngoscope, visual mask devices, thermal imaging cameras, power banks with jump starters, outdoor energy storage power supplies, beauty instruments, ultrasonic cleaner devices, and smart wearables
- Three contracted factories with ISO9001, ISO14001, TS16949, OSAHS18001, ISO13485, and BSCI certifications
- Products exported to over 30 countries and regions, including Germany, France, USA, Australia, and Japan
Summary_cn:
深圳志合电子科技有限公司

内窥镜和新能源产品

- 2009年成立的国家高新技术企业
- 专注于工业检测摄像头、耳鼻喉镜、喉镜、可视面罩设备、热成像相机、带跳线起动器的移动电源、户外储能电源、美容仪器、超声波清洁器设备和智能可穿戴设备
- 三个签约工厂拥有ISO9001、ISO14001、TS16949、OSAHS18001、ISO13485和BSCI认证
- 产品出口到德国、法国、美国、澳大利亚、日本等30多个国家和地区
